Expedition_delay_minutes: Expedition Delay Minutes(Random selection in the range)
sortiefleetStatus-start-info: Next sortie will apply fleet preset, then switch to disable
sortiefleetStatus-stop-info: When game start, reload, change robot fleet preset setting, sleeping time, it will switch to enable
sortieFleet-info: Apply from fleet presets, only support 1~3, please assign first
fastRepair-info: if repair time > config minutes then will use bucket
sortieSleepClear-info: In sleeping time will clear fleet to single ship
